act:
1092529 THE BANKING SERVICE COMMISSION (REPEAL) ACT, 2003
ACT NO. 29 OF 2003 [ 30th April, 2003.]
An Act to repeal the Banking Service Commission Act, 1984.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- fourth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
1935423 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Banking Service Commission (Repeal) Act, 2003.
1918789 2Repeal of Act 44 of 1984.- The Banking Service Commission Act, 1984 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN,
Secy. to the Govt. of India.
